enWisdom: Debt is bondage, repayment is freedom
Poverty with debt is [like] a red death
Poverty with debt is the greatest wretchedness
Debt is one of the two bondages
In every evil act there is retribution

Wisdom: كَثْرَةُ الدَّيْنِ تُصَيِّرُ الصَّادِقَ كَاذِباً وَالْمُنْجِزَ مُخْلِفاً
enWisdom: Too much debt makes a truthful person a liar and an honest person dishonest
In [keeping] the usurped rights of the servants, there is amassing of sins

Wisdom: لَمْ يَضِعْ مِنْ مَالِكَ مَا قَضَى قَرْضَكَ
enWisdom: That part of your wealth which is used to fulfil your obligations has not been lost
